```{r, echo=FALSE}
cities <- read.csv("../data/cities.csv", header=T, encoding = "UTF-8")
str(cities)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
cities %>% 
    group_by(continent) %>% 
    summarise(count_continent=n()) %>% 
    arrange(desc(count_continent)) %>% 
    kable()
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
cities %>% 
    group_by(country, continent) %>% 
    summarise(count_city=n()) %>% 
    arrange(desc(count_city)) %>% 
    kable()
```
